name: Pasta with Morels, Peas and Parmesan
description: An elegant spring pasta dish featuring wild morel mushrooms, fresh peas, and Parmesan cheese.
instructions: Bring to a boil 2 pots of water, one small and one large, and salt both.
Cut the morels into 4 pieces each, the long way
Cook the peas for 1 minute in the small pot;
Drain and cool quickly by submerging in ice water bath.
IN TANDEM Melt half the butter in a skillet.,
Brown Morels lightly in the butter, seasoning them with salt and pepper.
Cook the pasta until it is nearly done.
Just before draining the pasta, toss the peas and remaining butter (½ of total amount) with the morels in Saute pan
turn the heat for saute pan to medium.
Drain the pasta, reserving a little of the cooking water.
Toss the pasta with the morels and peas in the pasta pot; adding a little water if necessary to make the mixture saucy.
Toss with the Parmesan and lots of black pepper and serve immediately.
